main event: On the evening of 7 August 1967, a couple observed a bright, oval-shaped object while traveling along Highway 78 near Boonville, Mississippi.
interesting points: The object was silent and moved at a rapid speed,It emitted a bright, reddish-orange glow and was estimated to be 30 to 40 feet in diameter,The object made a sudden 90-degree turn and sped off towards the northeast,The couple felt shaken by the experience and believed it was not a conventional aircraft,The report was submitted to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
